longBusinessSummary: Premier Energies Limited manufactures and sells integrated solar cells and modules in India. It offers bifacial monocrystalline PERC cells; monofacial solar modules; and bifacial transparent back sheet and dual glass modules, as well as custom made panels for specific applications. The company provides engineering, procurement, and construction services for ground-mounted and rooftop solar power projects; upgradation services for transmission line and substation; and solar photo voltaic cells and solar products, such as solar water pumps, lanterns, lighting system, and solar e-vehicles. In addition, it operates a solar power project as project developer. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
